reviews.review: Great way to know Vietnam. I booked private tour - me and a guide alone for 3 days' trip. I was a little worry because I didn't drive motorcycle for many years but I decided to go for it.It is my 3rd time in Vietnam but it was the first time I really get to know the real Vietnam.The guide (Mr. Thon) picked me from my hotel exactly on time and took me to the office in Hanoi there I met Mr. Chung which was the man how deal with me by e-mails before. After short meeting I got some explanation about the tour and I choose helmet and gloves I got 250cc Honda almost new (9000km) and we were on the way to our first day. By the next 3 days we drove some hundreds of km (about 600km) on many kinds of roads and off-road. Crossed valleys / mountains/ rivers and villages passing through tea/ rice/ corn/ sugar cane and some other kind of fields we visited many markets and met a lot of local village people. All time Thon the guide checked that I'm o.k. and offered me some option of roads to choose according to my will. Mr. thon was so patient and never rushed me to go on even I made many many stops for photos (I did really many stops) During the 3 days all expenses (beside 1 hotel I choose to upgrade) ware paid by the guide. I never needed to take my wallet out even not once including buying cold drinks / coffeeOn the last day when we got back to the office I got SD card free of charged with all the video files Mr. Thon filmed during the trip with his Gopro on his helmet (some of the roads and some of me riding) For sure I'll do it again with Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert but next time it will be longer
Roundtrip . We make two times a trip in North Vietnam with this organisationIt was great excellent organizedHighly recommanded Dirk de Jong Holland

Northern Vietnam Tour. Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert co-ordinated and lead 8 of us on a fantastic adventure on CRF250cc Hondas. They arranged everything including guide, mechanic, motorbikes, support vehicle, accommodation and meals. In short, it was awesome with great sights, wonderful food and excellent service. We requested off-road components every day and they made sure it met our expectations and capabilities.

Unforgettable. Did a 10 day trip with 3 other mid 50 yo plus mates to the North and North East of Hanoi. From start to finish, Chung was prompt with emails and the entire admin process was smooth. We rode 250's, although none of the riding was too much for the 150 that our guide rode. In fact if you're on the short side (say 175 cm or less) or less experienced you would be better on the smaller bike. Accommodation was mostly hotels with 2 homestays. All apart from 1 were clean (I believe that will be sorted) and comfortable. Hot showers everywhere. The food was plentiful and no one suffered more than could be expected given the radical diet change. The longest days were around the 230km mark, averaging about 180km. Our group found it reasonably tiring due to the high levels of concentration required to ride safely given the Vietnamese penchant for overtaking on blind corners and hills together with the poor standard of roads and the many 'obstacles' wandering around. All part of the adventure though. Our guide Thon was very good and was always making sure we were happy and well fed and watered. We had a back up vehicle for our gear which is essential unless you are happy in the same clothes for 10 days. We were able to do washing at 1 stop. Road conditions range from good sealed freeways to goat tracks along the side of mountains (you can opt out of the more extreme riding. You dictate the route to some degree). Traffic is frenetic at times and there is no doubt it has a degree of danger about it. We met fellow travelers with no previous riding experience but I would think their itinerary would be less rushed and therefore safer.We had 1 and a half rain days but it was never cold. Wear light armour and take a rain jacket with you on the bike. Summer gloves were best for our ride. The people are very friendly and constantly waving as you ride by. Plenty of low fives from the children. The whole experience is a sensory overload. Take a go pro or similar on the helmet if you want although the guide/s take vision which you get at the end. Wi-fi is available absolutely everywhere. We didn't bother to get a local sim card and managed fine. Hardly saw a mosquito anywhere but take a DEET spray anyway. Take half as many undies as days as you can easily wash in the shower. (same with socks) and they dry overnight with the air con and fan on. 2 x shorts, 2 x dark shirts, riding gear and maybe a pair of jeans, thongs and trainers. Unless you're doing a full off road trip, a full face helmet is best. Even the sealed roads are dusty. If I did another trip, I would have had a rest day, with no riding, in the middle of the trip. I reckon anything over about 7 days is getting to the stage of needing a break in the middle (maybe not for the young of course).I haven't wanted to sugar coat the trip - it is challenging, but it will be one of the best and most memorable experiences of your life. I don't believe there could be a better mob to do it with than Chung and his team if you are considering it. And ask for the tee shirt - I'm expecting a commission!

Amazing experience with unreal service. Recently completed the 11 day Ho Chi Minh trail tour with 6 other mates. Great guides with Jonny and Whan with Phuc following with our gear. Bikes top quality, support and guides top quality, accommodation and food top quality. Vietnam motorbike tour expert...........Top Quality great operator great tour. Looking forward to booking our next adventure with these guys soon ! Cheers Jonny, Whan and PhucBuddha - King Browns !

Safe, sublime, superb!. My friend Demi and I chose a three day tour with Chung, we were worried because of our lack of experience with riding bikes, however, Chung tailored the tour to our needs, making sure that we were safe on the roads yet still had an exciting time on the motorcycles. Our guide Lee always watched out for us and lead us through the most stunning, sublime countryside, far from the crazy streets of Hanoi, into the mountains where green peaks rose majestically over lush fields and lakes and friendly people and children waved and shouted 'hello'. The motorcycle tour was the best part of my trip around SE Asia by far! Thoroughly enjoyed it and can highly recommend it to anyone who loves adventure! Will now be get some more biking experience so we can come back and do a longer tour off road with Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert.Thank you Chung and Lee and Demi! Anna x

Amazing, awesome and addictive!. My friend and I decided on a three day tour of the mountains and by the end, neither of us wanted to leave and come back to reality. In fact, I was already planning my next trip with VMTE before the end of our first day.Chung and his team really know exactly what they're doing, to plan a fantastic (and safe!) trip that is catered to your wants and needs. From the moment we contacted them about the tour to after we had said our goodbyes, their friendly and thoughtful service was impeccable.The trip itself exceeded expectations... After leaving the smogginess of Hanoi, we had a slow but interesting build-up to some truly spectacular scenery. I will never forget some of that countryside or the smiles of the local people. And this was all whilst experiencing the exhilarating excitement of being on a motorbike!In regards to our tour guide, Lee, you really knew you were in safe hands. And personally, it was really inspiring to be in the company of someone who was living their dream.Overall, I believe that there is only one way to experience Vietnam, and that is on a motorcycle. You really can't go wrong with Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert - they will look after you and by the end, you will end up thinking that you should pack your job in, buy a bike and go see the world...

Thank you so much. These guys really know their stuff and planned everything to a T for us.Unfortunately we had to cut our planned trip extremely short and fly back home but Chung and Johnny fixed us up for a night in a hotel and arranged a day trip near Hanoi for us at very short notice.What little time we did have with Johnny we really enjoyed. The riding was great fun and experience won't be forgotten. When we return, we shall contact Chung again and organise our trip around the North.

What an amazing experience!. My (high) expectations were exceeded by Vuong and Chung. Riding for 5 days in the north-west was the highlight of the my 2 weeks vacation in Vietnam. Words cannot describe how amazing the whole trip has been, from eating with the locals and the stunning landscapes, (drinking more vietnamese coffee than I should have), having fun off-road, ...and a great crew to share the adventure with. I honestly couldn't have asked for something better, once in a lifetime experience!Planning to go back and explore the north-east!You guys rock!

Real adventure. I was fortunate to tag on last minute to a group of guys doing a 5 day tour up to the north of vietnam..it was the most incredible experience. 5 days full of technical riding, unique and beautiful landscapes, and some awsome people to share it all with. I was the least experienced but was well taken care of with expert guidance from our talented tour guide Vuong (the Tiger). He ensured we were safe and at all times enjoying the whole experience. We were provided with quality bikes and equipment which handled the terrain and me effortlessly.I can say whole heartedly we got to see and experience the real vietnam from the sights and food to the people along the way.A massive recommendation from me for the guy's at vietnam motorbike tour experts, Mr Chung for all the organising and Mr vuong for his unforgettable tour. You guys are legends I'll definitely be back!

Outstanding motorbike tour. North west Vietnam tour, five days, best guide ever Vuong and four fantastic friends!The tour was half on off road street and half on paved road. The off road part brought us to unforgettable places, bamboo bridges and river crossings.We enjoyed so much the homestay!Voung always keep an eye on us, help us for everything and teach us how to approach some off road ways.!!!!Thank you so much!!!Lorenzo

We will talk about this amazing trip for a long time. My wife and I, in the 55+ range, decided after a conversation with our daughter and her partner who had recently been to Vietnam, that a motorbike tour was the thing to do. After some internet research, and based on great reviews we decided to contact Chung and book a 4 day trip. Chung was excellent with his emails and organisation. We decided on a Honda CRF 250, as I am quite tall and my wife was riding pillion. Due to our daughter's photos and stories, we rocked up in our running shoes and shorts! Chung didn't bat an eyelid but probably thought "what a couple of wallies"! Our guide was Tung and he was absolutely brilliant. He looked after us every step of the way. The tour was fantastic with a good range of highway and back roads. We feel we saw a great deal of the "real" Vietnam. The people were so friendly, the food was wonderfully delicious (in fact what we have been eating after that, just doesn't have the flavour or range). Tung made sure we had plenty of water, rest stops and food. He was a very good people person, always happy and easy to be around. Two of the nights were at home stays which again really added to the whole experience. Would recommend this company to anyone who wants an adventure. Would definitely do this again with a couple of mates and leave the ladies at the Hotel Spa and shops. Can't recommend our experience enough. Thank you Chung and Tung.

Amazing tour with an expert tour leader. At short notice these guys put together a 5 day 4 night tour to the northern mountains of Vietnam staying in home stays and hotels which was nothing short of amazing. There is no way that you can capture and experience as much of this country in such a short time without doing it on a motorbike.Thon, our guide really knew his stuff and made sure we were all ok the whole trip.I'd love to do another trip with these guysThanks to all

Great fun. My friend and I booked the three day two night tour without any previous motor biking experience. Chung was able to adapt to our demands and provided two automatic bikes which enabled us to experience the amazing scenery. Our guide vuong was very friendly and was great fun. Well until he scared a couple of girls by his obscure music taste! All in all a fantastic trip and one which won't be forgotten.

Amazing Trip with a great company and tour guide. Where do i start?Hanoi going north to the Chinese boarder on near new Honda 250 dirt bikes and then looping back to Hanoi.6 days of absolute fun and pleasure with a great bunch of mates and the best tour guide you could have wanted - Johny :-)We saw parts of the North that only locals knew about. Stayed at Farm Stays and hotels with everything included in the cost except beer. I did put on 5kg and know it was the Hanoi draft beers :-)The Owner Chung, is such a nice man and just wanted us to see and experience Vietnam and love our time there. He succeeded there and i was overcome by the warmth, friendliness and generosity of the Vietnamese people. So happy and welcoming.We were escorted on the tour by Johny (his english name and had something to do with..... you better ask him:-) and were very lucky to have him as our guide. Local knowledge and an eye always on us to make sure no one was left behind. We saw a little of Vietnam and i so want to go back and see more. And it will be with these guys and their perfectly maintained near new bikes.Thanks again Johny and Chung. You made our trip a life long memory.

Excellent tour. Did a 3 day tour with these guys and couldn't be happier with how it went. Setting things up with Chung went smoothly, and my guide Lee was a true professional as well as being a great guy. The bikes are in great shape and performed flawlessly. The riding was fun and challenging, and the route was colorful and scenic. Highly recommend this company for your motorbike adventure.

Vietnam Motorbike Tour - A real adventure. We chose the 6 day tour out of Hanoi to Ha Giang. We had numerous communications with Mr Chung the organisation Manager and who was able to answer all our questions prior to the trip. His English is excellent and his responses were prompt and conciseWe were able to choose the 2016 Honda CRF 250L motorbikes, which were well maintained and in excellent condition. They turned out to be perfect for the journey, especially considering the type of terrain and the locations we visited. Our host for the tour was "Jonnie" and he proved to be an extremely good leader and very knowledgeable about all the destinations we visited.Accommodation, food and drink along the way, were all great and in keeping with the whole experience.It was very comforting to know that, both Mr Chung and Jonnie were very experienced, had good contacts where ever went and had contingency plans for any unexpected events that pop up.My group were all very happy with the tour experience as it represents good value for money, the Tour operators are very honest and easy to communicate with.Highly recommended!!! A great experience.Mark - Sydney

VIETNAM MOTORBIKE TOUR EXPERT, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!. Me and my friend from Hong Kong booked 2 XR150 bikes for 2 days 1 night tour to Mai Chau with Chung from 13th August to 14th August. Everything was done smoothly and without any problem. Our tour guide Tan picked up us from our hotel in the morning and took us to their office. I met Chung, waiting for us & it was really a warm welcome. We selected helmets, gloves...& there are many bike accessories to choose from. Bikes were all new & in great condition. Under the guidance of Tan our tour was really amazing, and there are so many unforgettable memorable moments. Foods were awesomely delicious. Wished had more time to do more tour with them. I would recommend this tour group to anyone.They are reliable, helpful and really down to earth. Great service. Worth every moment. Will come back for more tours in the future.Thank you.Surya.

Fantastic Ride to the Countryside - 1 Day Tour. My girlfriend and I booked a one day bike trip to the countryside of Hanoi, and it was one of the best days we had in Vietnam. I rode an XR 150 while my girlfriend sat pillion with our guide, Chung. I was a little apprehensive of the Hanoi traffic at first but it was only short ride on the busy roads and having a decent bike definitely makes a difference. After leaving Hanoi we rode through rice paddies, visited beautiful Pagodas, stopped for lunch (loads of local food we hadn't tried in the city) and visited a number of different villages. Chung was a true expert with an extensive knowledge of the local history to share. We finished the day feeling that we had really learned a lot and experienced the real Vietnam. I was glad we booked with VMTE rather than one of the hostels or shops that rent scooters - quality bikes and a quality guide made the day a highlight of our trip. Thanks Chung!

The real Vietnam - Hanoi to Hoi An in 11 Days. Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert is a fantastic way to experience the real Vietnam. Our guide had exceptional knowledge of Northern Vietnam: the places to eat, the off-road tracks to take, the places to stay and visit (homestay and hotel). The bikes were new near and so much fun to ride. Professional service before, during and after the tour with organising transfers to and from accommodation and transporting luggage to final destination. Would highly recommend them to anyone.

Amazing Motorbike Tour To Ha Giang - 6 Days. This 6 day trip was a trip of a lifetime for 3 of my good friends and myself and we could not have chosen a more genuine and professional tour company than motor Bike Tour Expert. The company owner Chung has put together a fleet of new 2016 and near new Honda bikes that were a pleasure to ride.Our guide for this trip Culng (affectionately known as Johnny Walker) was extremely friendly, competent and knowledgeable of the vast area of Vietnam we covered over 6 fantastic days of riding, sightseeing, eating, fun mixed with Vietnamese village culture and history. We are happy to strongly recommend Motor Bike Tour Expert and their genuine approach to sharing the love of their country, culture and a passion for motor cycle touring.Kevin R. Simon D. Mark R. and David G. Sydney Aust.

Unforgettable 3 Day Tour!. Couldn't have asked for a better experience! Myself and 4 other friends came to Hanoi looking for something unique to do, and stumbled upon this tour. From start to finish, the service was some of the best we have ever experienced, and our organizer and guides Chung, Tan and Quang did everything within their ability to ensure a smooth and safe trip. I would also say that to fully appreciate the beauty of Hanoi, one should definitely travel into the country around the rivers, hills and lakes and this tour is an exciting and fun way to do so. We stopped every so often to take in the beauty of the scenery and to take photos. The food at every meal was also exceptional; on our particular route we stayed at a Tai minority village in Mai Chau for a one night homestay and the food was simply incredible and just so fresh, as it was sourced from their very own farms. If I were to come back to Vietnam in the future I would definitely do this again. Don't miss this experience!

Best ride of my life !!!. These guys are top notch !!! From customer service to riding expertise these guys know what they're doing and are truly professional. From the very first contact with Chung through email, they were able to answer all my questions and responded quickly. Everything went so smoothly prior to the ride I expected something to go wrong, but it didn't. The ride was perfect. Hoang, my guide took me along some amazing roads with views that words could not describe. Even the pictures won't do it justice. I opted for the short 2 day ride to Mai Chau and back and it was spectacular!!! We rode on everything from dirt, gravel, mud, single track, small paved roads to large roads, roughly 380km. It was truly an experience I will never forget. I'm definitely coming back to ride with these guys to a different destination on my next Vietnam trip.

Vietnam the land of the Giants !. What an adventure, the bike trip of a life time. The Vietnamese people are the friendliest you'll ever meet. 7 fantastic days exploring Vietnam. Thanks Lee for everything

11 day tour. Looking for an adventure and a lot of fun. Totally recommend these guys. Tour leader Johnny was professional , had great knowledge of local history and was a lot of fun. The whole team Johnny , mechanic Tu and back up driver Fuk made sure the experience was one to remember. Cheers guys and thanks againPat

16-20 June 16 5-Day NorthWest Vietnam. I had a fantastic time riding solo with my guide Hoan on a brand new Honda XR 150! The scenery was beautiful and ever changing and the pretty vietnam girls riding everywhere makes my heart pound! Enjoyed every moment of it! I would definitely be back again soon!

Absolutely awesome 6 day North West tour. Can't rate this tour company enough! Chung the owner made everything so easy even when we had flight delays, our tour guide Vuong was awesome, had a great knowledge of the local area and catered exceptionally well for every riders abilities. Nothing was a problem! The bikes were very well maintained and great to ride! The places we stayed great and the food was amazing!Would definalty recommend this company to anyone that is looking at doing a tour! I will be back. Thanks guys.

Fantastic 7 days. 3 mates and myself have just finished a 7 day tour. From the first contact with Chung to the last day of the tour everything was better than expected. We chose the 7 day tour that ended in Da Nang, not really an off road tour but nevertheless the scenery on many parts of the trip was spectacular. Our guide for the week, Lee looked after us very well, nothing was too much trouble and he always had a smile on his face. Midway through the week on of the bikes had a puncture, Lee had a the tools and spares required to change the tube in a road side cafe, it all added to the experience.I would have no hesitation in recommending Chung and his team to anyone who is looking for a well organised, professional motorcycle adventure in North Vietnam, great job guys, hopefully we will see you again soon.

Trip of a life time. What more can I say this business is extremely well managed buy Chung this was show when we had flight delays on our way getting to Vietnam and he had the bikes move to a location closer to the airport so that we could still make our first homestay on time . Vuong is an excellent tour guide and is very well spoken in English he accommodated for all riding abilities I would recommend this company to anyone looking to see the real Vietnam and once again would like to thank vuong for everything he did for us along the way I will be back

What a Ride. This company is first class, latest bikes and a professional service, Chung the owner and Vuong our tour guide were a pleasure to deal with, nothing was an issue and made my experience something to remember. I had not ridden a bike for many years and was a little worried about my fitness but everything turned out fantastic !I highly recommend this company if you would like to see some great sights, enjoy riding and generally want to experience something uniqueSteve

4day/3 night trip. great bikes with a great guide (huan) made this trip the highlight of our holiday. The homestays were ideal ways to get a bit of a local feel for the area. Travelling via back roads was a lot of fun with plenty of stops for photos and local food tasting. A bit of a sore bum but very worth it. Much recommended

6 day north vietnam loop . What a fantastic way to see north vietnam away from all the tourists , we had a fantastic tour guide Vuong who showed us the best way to see the best scenery and stay with traditional vietnamese families and other great accommodation and fantastic traditional vietnamese food all along the way, a trip ill never forget , thanks Vuong and motorcycle tour expert vietnam ..
Awesome Experience. Off the tourist track and jam packed with adventure. Our guide Vuong took us places we'd never have experienced. Bloody awesome and would definitely recommend.

12hrs in Hanoi. My wife and I had a 12hr stopover in Hanoi Airport, so we decided to make the most of our short sojourn in Vietnam and organise a motorbike tour to see as much of the countryside and city as possible. Chung was flexible with our request and arranged for a airport pick up following our early morning flight into the city. We were both non-bikers so we rode on two bikes with Chung and Katie driving.We did the Countryside Tour which was a great was to see the rice paddy fields and enjoy the scenery of Vietnam. Our guides did a good job of explaining everything and checking in with us to make sure we were ok.Despite us being tired from a 10hr flight they did well to show us the country side life and scenery. We never felt unsafe on the road, nor did we feel that our guides didn't know the area. We planned to meet Chung's relatives but unfortunately we ran late and they were all asleep for the afternoon siesta!All in all, if you have one day to experience Vietnam this isn't a bad shout. Chung provided great local advice and insight, even helping out with food recommendations as well as dropping us off at the water puppet theatre. He also arranged for a taxi to pick us up from central Hanoi and take us back to the airport.Pros:- Flexible- Good local knowledge- Safe and reliable, bikes well maintained- Friendly on the ground and great communication prior to arrival via email- Chung made a GoPro video of our trip and sent it over to us afterwards as a nice memento of our time, very thoughtful!Cons:- Personally it became a bit of rice-paddy-overload after a while, consider mixing with a city tour, or having more variety by going around other places if you have more time.- Food was a bit limited during the tour, we asked for veggie but didn't get many options.

8 Day trip of a lifetime. Best experience of my life and a large part of that was the organisation by our guide Johnno. Our bikes were new and near new and so never missed a beat.Johnno's knowledge, planning, service and humour made what would have been a great experience into the best holiday I've ever had. We put our faith in him about where to go, what to do and what to eat and were never disappointed

4-Day Loop Tour From Hanoi. My boyfriend and I were looking for a safe and reliable bike tour company, as it was our first time doing such tour and found this. Prior to our trip, we were liaising with Chung via email and he was very informative and responsive. He made sure we were comfortable with his recommendation before we made the deposit. When we arrived in Hanoi and met up with him, he let my boyfriend try a couple of bikes to see which he prefers and is more comfortable in riding. On the tour itself, our guide Hoan was generous, accommodating and of course friendly. He offered to pay for many of our drinks during pit stops, even though it wasn't included in the package. Hoan also brought us to try a variety of Vietnamese cuisine and always asked what we felt like eating. At our last homestay, we were privileged to stay and meet Hoan's family who very warmly welcomed us with delicious homecooked food and rice wine. Overall, we had an exceptional experience and meeting Chung and Hoan made it a memorable one. :) Hope to see you guys soon!

Vietnam 8 Day Motorcycle Tour . What an amazing adventure this turned out to be. From the moment we were collected from our hotel in Hanoi by Lead Guide, Jonny, you felt comfortable and could see that he knew what he was doing. We were taken to the head office by bus and then the bikes were all lined up outside the workshop. .........12 fresh CRF250L's ...and it started. The lead guide, Jonny and Hoan, his second in charge were incredilble, as was Chi the tours mechanic........there was nothing he could not sort out. He was lubing the chains of all the bikes at regular intervals, changing tyres without hesitation. The trip took us through all types of sceney and terrain, much of which i would have missed if I'd done it by myself. There was nothing that Jonny or the guys wouldn't do for you. The accommodation was all organised as was the meals. The support truck was never far behind, this allowed us to not have gear on the bikes (highly recommend this ). The 14 of us from our tour have only had positive things to say about how well organised Jonny, Hoan, Chi and the team were. None of us wanted it to stop and are already talking of another trip. If you are wanting to to do a motorcycle tour of the real Vietnam on quality bikes, you need to check this company out. Chung, the owner of Motorcycle Tour Expert, runs a high quality adventure business, with excellent staff.I will definitely do another tour with this company. Jono.T. Wollongong. NSW. Australia.

8 day Ho Chi Mihn Trail GLR Tour . Can't rate this company any higher, great organization, bikes and places if interest throughout the tour. The guides where outstanding and loads of fun. Chung thankyou for helping me make this trip happenand hassle free. Give my best to your crew, and Im looking forward to my next tour.Cheers Dave

Day tour countryside. Our private tour exceeded all expectations, a professional company who has the highest standards in safety and service. We were provided with quality late model motor bikes, gloves, elbow / knee shin guards if we wanted them and proper helmets. The tour was at our own pace with no pressure. An awesome lunch was provided with many drink rest stops along the way all included. We saw so much! Rice fields, villages, temples, markets and so much scenery. Chung was our private guide he looked after us very well we had an amazing day this tour company is the real deal cheers
8 Day Tour Hanoi to De Nang. Awesome. Unreal. Best trip ever. Our guides Johnnie, Hoan and Chi were fantastic. CRF250 bikes were great. Loved it!!!

8 Day Ho Chi Minh Trail Tour Jefff GLR. Wow what an adventure...!!! These guys know how to put a tour together and look after you, from well maintained current motorbikes, well educated and informed guides Johnny and his 2IC Hoan, a friendly mechanic Chi, and back up staff in back up vehicles, this TEAM go out of their way to share their country and their culture with you, getting off track and exposing you to the real Vietnam, not just the tourist spots, what an eye opening and humbling experience. I can not speak highly enough of this company and am looking forward to returning and being hosted by them again.We had 13 riders and 2 non riders on our Tour (Good Lookin' Roosters Vietnam Tour 2016) and our meals and accommodation were sorted all the way, regular stops and nothing was a hassle for our guides.The guys mixed in well with us and genuine friendships were grown.I would encourage anyone thinking about a Motorbike Tour in Vietnam to stop thinking about it....and JUST DO IT....... with this company ......Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert.

Six day motorcycle tour to Ha Giang and beyond. Our tour was well organised , and our bikes were in exerlent condition . Our guide Tan took us on a awesome trip through lowland rice growing areas ,to home stays with wonderful hospitality . Then into the stunning mountains of North Vietnam which just blow you away . The food was great , an the accomodation varied and very adaquate , it was just ashame it had to end . I will definitely be returning to do another trip . Robert

Exciting, Adventure, Awesome. After long talking to my wife to do this trip i got her at the end on to the motorbike. Starting with the easy reservation by email and only small reservation fee me got already excited at this time. Arriving at the shop we saw the almost new Honda 250ccm bike. Also for free we got helmet, knee & elbow safer and gloves. After about 30 minutes we started and after another half hour we left busy Hanoi behind us. Great streets abroad HW's with almost no traffic. On the old streets u really can enjoy the sceneries and views. We stopped every hour for drink or eating. Perfect timing and also great for my wife. After the 1st day she started to love our trip. Wife happy - husband even more happy. All the stopps for drinking, eating and sleeping was great. Best of all was our homestay at last day. Eating, drinking with the family and also enjoyed the homemade rice wine. Be careful of the tiger (husband homestay) :-) he will try to make ur drunk. Little headache in the morning and abit tired but it was our last day and we drove back after 4 awesome days on the bike. Thanks to our guide. We could see alot and also interesting storys about Vietnam. We been safe in all ways... never afraid about the route and never had danger time. The bike was in great shape and easy to drive. If u wanna do it also... don't think only about it... do it with this guys. Now we are waiting for our vid the did on the trip.

8 DAY HO CHI MINH TRAIL TOUR. This is a very well organised tour company. Everything from late model bikes (2015) in excellent condition, well planned route, great hotels and meals, and nothing left to chance. Best of all are the support crew, and guides (Johnny, Hoan, and Chen) which became more like family members as the tour progressed. Nothing was too much trouble, and with their local knowledge, ensure that everyone is well looked after and have a lot of fun. Vietnam is a great country for anyone wishing to get away from the tourist trail and enjoy new horizons. Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert company will exceed all your expectations. I'll be back for another tour.Franko (April 2016)

8 Day Northen Vietnam Tour. Fantastic tour. Our guides Johnnie, Yuan and Chi were professional and all around good blokes. Nothing was too difficult for them. We had 13 riders in our group of friends so they were kept on their toes. We all had CRF250's ranging from brand new to 3yrs old. Which in Vietnam is exceptional to find. I would recommend the ride to all and urge you to use this company.

Great team, helpfull management and guides, customised to suit interest and skill level - fantastic experience. Did the Ho Chi Minh Trail with my daughter and 5 other friends. Chung was great with all the planning questions. The team had spare helmets and knee/elbow guards for those that wanted them - at no charge. The guide Ton and mechanic Do and support driver were all fantastic. Looking after inexperienced riders, adjusting the exact roads covered based on our interest and experience. Good system and experienced on Vietnam's busy roads - ensuring we all made safe overtakes and got the distance covered each day. They were excellent in making sure we were all sorted in hotels each day and fed and watered. Even helped with getting our last night accommodation (after the tour) booked and getting our laundry booked in with the hotel. Much lower cost than some other options. Accommodation standard very good, except for 1 location. Food standard excellent. Exceptional value and a well run operation - thanks guys.

Fantastic 8 day tour. Took the 8 day northern tour with 8 friends. Tour was fantastic; everything from the bikes (new CRF250), the guides (Vuong and Chi), scenery, authentic food, culture and much more. Not being a fan of big busy cities like Hanoi this was the perfect way to get out and see real Vietnam. The mountain scenery was spectacular and the riding a good mix of road, tracks, off-road and detours through small farming communities. Would highly recommend. Thanks for a great trip Tour Experts!

Excellent tour. Had an excellent tour which was lots of fun. Chung was prompt and patient with my many questions. He was very happy to help and made is feel very welcome. Johnnie is a terrific guide. He is very personable and kind. As it was just the two of us on the tour, we could change details day to day. We were very tired and wanted a slow day so stopped earlier than planned. Johnnie also organised to have a lunch at a real home stay which was amazing to see how true vietnamese live. We were really sick on the last day and Johnnie offered to have a truck come pickup the bikes so we could just rest. He was very kind and compassionate towards us. Also, he was very funny and fun to be around and definently made the trip. Would definently recommend this company and Johnnie as an excellent tour guide

An amazing experience!. In February myself and my father took a 15 day tour around the Northern loop and then down to Nah Trang.When organising the trip, Chung was really helpful and responsive, answering all our questions quickly and giving great advice.We took the 250cc Hondas (new bikes in great condition) and they were really comfortable for doing 200+km every day. Plus they are great fun off road!Tom, our tour guide, was excellent and handled everything throughout the trip. He knows a lot of great off road trails, floating bridges, beautiful landscapes etc. that we wouldn't have found without him.We looked at a few different companies before deciding on Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert and I am glad we did.Highly recommended!

Incredible experience. I just returned from a 2 day trip to Mai Chiau. Before I arrived, Chung, the owner was incredibly responsive and helpful. I was amazed at the level of professionalism that goes into the tour.Arranging pickup from my hotel, taking care of meals and hotels along the tour route, Chung makes sure to take care of every single detail.Quynh was an incredible guide. Not only was he fun and humorous, but also ensured I felt safe and informed throughout my whole experience. He really went above and beyond to make sure I enjoyed my trip.I would recommend Chung's tours and Quynh as a guide to anyone. I walk away from this experience only wanting to go back - thank you for the unforgettable trip!

Trip of a Lifetime!. A couple of friends and I went on the 4 day, 3 night tour in Northern Vietnam. Before we even arrived I could tell that the owner, Chung, was acutely focused on customer service. He provided a variety of recommendations specifically tailored to the time we had available and the sights we were interested in seeing. I changed the dates, number of riders, and sizes of bikes numerous times, and not once did he complain or show any frustration. On the contrary, he happily adjusted to every request! All of the prices were clearly discussed in advance and there were no hidden fees or needless attempts to up sell. It made the entire administrative process relaxing and enjoyable. They would get 5 stars based on their customer service alone.Our guide, Vuong, picked us up at our hotel, showed us to their office and fitted us with all of the necessary gear and a few extras that some of us hadn't prepared for (rain gear that was essential later in the trip!). The bikes are almost new and in great condition. That being said, Vuong brought a tool kit and performed preventative maintenance on the bikes every day in order to ensure we had a safe ride. You won't have to worry about a thing.The ride itself was magnificent! We worked our way through the Hanoi traffic, along side streets, through banana groves, and quickly found ourselves on dirt roads and paths through isolated parts of the country. We were surrounded by loads of animals, waving children, friendly faces, and breathtaking scenery. The only recommendation I would make for you as a customer is to make sure you're comfortable on a motorcycle/dirt bike. Our group didn't have much experience off road, but Vuong did an excellent job of providing us with just the right amount of challenge during the ride. I learned some new skills and had a great time doing it! He also took a ton of pictures for us and with us from a lot of different angles and he had a blast doing it. He really fit in well with our group and had a great sense of humor!He took us to numerous places to eat and never failed to impress. The food was superb and he taught us a few tricks to spice things up a little! For one of the nights, we stayed at the home of a family where they made us an enormous spread of delicious food, and stayed around afterwards to converse and share their rice wine with us. We felt very welcome and I would say that was certainly one of the highlights of the trip for me.In the end, we all returned safe, happy, and spent! I am so glad that I chose this company for this tour. With most trips like this, I would say that it was a once in a lifetime experience... but I am already considering my next trip back to Vietnam to take a longer tour! Don't miss out on this adventure!

Priceless. We did the 2D1N ride to Mai Chiau. I was the pillion and bf was the rider. Our guide, Quynh took excellent care of us. Very knowledge and experienced rider. You feel assured that you're in good hands. Plus point was the delicious meals. Sights were breath-taking.. Was in awe of the beautiful of the nature.. Weaving through Hanoi traffic can be nerve wrecking but because Chung and Quynh had briefed us on how it'll be like.. It was actually quite enjoyable and experience going through the mass of cars and bikes.No regrets for sure and already planning a longer tour. Will definitely be back for more!

London Bikers do amazing 6 Days North Vietnam tour. Amazing views, people, food and trails. Our tour guide Lee took us on some great roads/trails that only he knew. A bonus was he takes quality pictures and videos at all the right times and spots to give you a really memorable trip. Homestay was excellent and much better than I was expecting. Impressed with the whole level of service and organisation from start to finish by Chung and Lee. I would highly recommend and trust these guys if you are a biker and want a dream tour.

Great Tour with the best company.. North Vietnam - 11 Days. We had the best trip touring the North of the country. Everyday was an adventure whether seeing the sights, food, dodging traffic & having fun. Vuong is a great tour guide and designed the trip so that we would have the best fun. We never felt our of comfort zone with our ability to ride on the bikes and found the right match of dirt and roads. When booking your trip you must use this company, you won't regret it. Chung replies to all your emails and takes your phone calls to answer any question. Very well run business that know what they are doing.

amazing trip through the countryside with a great guide!. i was slightly nervous of the traffic but my guide chung assured me it would be fine and it was amazing, he was very knowledgeable and answered a bunch of questions i had along the way, the day trip route was amazing through rice paddys and feilds and along smaller roads. cant recommend highly enough, if you like motorbikes and adventure then youll love it! 10/10!

Hanoi Countryside Tour. My wife and I left the motorcycle tour to the last day of our Vietnam Holiday. But as they say leave the best till last. What a wonderful way to see the local countryside. Mostly off road tracks and stopping whenever to take pictures. Cuong was an excellant guide & Chung kept us up to date with emails before the ride. Highly recommended at the end of the tour, theres about 10k of Hanoi traffic now that was an experience i'll never forget!

My friend and I did a guided 5 day / 4 night version of the NW loop tour (normally 6 days / 5 nights).. It was an amazing experience. Highly recommended.The roads and trails were a blast. Hardly any straight sections to be seen for 5 days, just constant winding curving, climbing, descending, motorcyclists dream, type roads. Paved, gravel, dirt, single track, all of it was super fun.The Honda CRF250s were comfortable and very enjoyable to ride on all the terrain and road types we encountered.The food was outstanding.Our guide, Johnny, was great. Relaxed and enjoyable to be around. Fun to ride with and invaluable for guidance to the best meals, and of course the trails and roads we would have never been able to find on our own.We were limited to just 2 of us (long time friends) and our guide. If you are going to join another group you may want to see if your riding styles will be similar.

Four day's of unforgettable memories. Myself and two friends have just completed a four day tour, a great experience we will never forget.Booking via email was easy with Chung always responding quickly and providing all the information we required.Vuong our guide was brilliant, taking us on an assortment of roads and trails but always within our varying abilities, stopping frequently for us to admire the spectacular views and scenery. He made sure we had excellent food throughout; accommodation was a mixture of homestays with welcoming friendly families and hotel. The bikes were in great condition and were checked over frequently by Vuong.I would recommend anyone who is thinking of doing a motorbike tour in Vietnam to use Vietnam Motorbike tour expert, I know that we are already thinking of doing a longer tour to relive a totally unforgettable experience.

Four day option. Three of us in our 50s have just completed the four day option, the other reviews helped us with our choice of company, I can only agree with all the fantastic comments, I only wish we had done longer. Vuong was our guide, a complete professional and great guy to have along, he quickly learnt our different levels of experience and accommodated appropriately. We will be doing this again. This experience will live with me forever, the people, views, biking, just everything was spot on, I was not expecting the food to be so good. The bikes were in excellent condition and always being checked by Vuong during the trip. We paid the extra for the van to follow us round, I would recommend this. From the minute we were picked up, taken to the office, and dropped back off we were very well looked after, just can't wait to get back and do a longer trip. I would say the weather is more variable in the North so pick your month to suite your preference, it's not five star hotels but I would not have swapped the home stays for them. This is a true way to discover Vietnam. Loved it all, the biking exceeded all my expectations, left wondering how I better this whole experience. Andrew

Incredible northern loop tour!!. My brother and I did the 8 day northern loop trip it was BRILLIANT! The countryside was beautiful. Motorbike tour experts had everything organized, and our guide Johnnie was flawless! When we wanted more offroad he found us tracks, and he was alway friendly and willing to answer all our questions about the local culture. And don't get me started on the food...you definitely won't lose weight on this trip! Can't wait to plan my next one!

15 Day North to South, Hanoi to Saigon bike trip.. I couldn't keep track how many times I said Wow!!! when we were riding through the country. Beautiful !!! I'm 53 years old, Best bike trip I've ever been on. Johnny our guide was great. He always tried his best to accommodate us. I wouldn't hesitate to go with Johnny again. Thanks!!

Vietnam Express. I just finished the Grand Ho Chi Minh trail motorbike tour 15 days... What an amazing trip from Hanoi to HCMC, the views and roads very nothing short of amazing. Are guide Johnny was really what made the trip one I will never forget, from his great sense of humour to his knowledge of the country and its back road adventures he took us on. The food was amazing from fresh seafood to beef soup for breakfast and the tour did not stop at the end of the day, there was always a great meal and discussions about the days ride followed by a little/lot of happy water (rice wine). I look forward to my next adventure with Johnny and Vietnam Expert Motorbike Tours.Regards,David Baptist

Adventure of a lifetime!. I just got back from a 3 day, 1 person tour, with this company and everything you read here is spot on. Chung was quick & professional via email during the booking process and provided good information on tour options based on the time I had available and my input on what I wanted to do. I spent the 3 INCREDIBLE days riding through the scenic countryside with an awesome guide Lee, all while learning about the landscape, Vietnamese culture, and his own compelling personal story. He spoke good english and was very knowledgeable about the roads and different options for routes each day. I told him after Day 1 that I wanted to hit some dirt and he changed our route for the day to an awesome dirt road & mountain pass. Couldn't have been any happier. I've learned one important lessons through my various travels... you get what you pay for. I did a lot of online research before booking and decided, because of TripAdvisor, that I would spend the extra money for quality and it was the right decision. I saw a few other tour companies while on tour and the quality of the bikes the were renting was very sub par compared to the practically brand new CRF250 I was riding. My only regret is not booking a longer tour...so now I just have to go back. Thanks for everything CHUNG & LEE!

Mr Rick . Had a fantastic six day tour up to Ha Giang and beyond. Met some good fellow bikers and truly friendly locals, visited many places, great twisty roads with some fun off-roading and river crossings, spectacular views all of which would not have been possible without the local knowledge of our very experience guide and mechanic Tan. Would recommend the tour to anyone who enjoys biking and a bit of an adventure.

Excellent way to see the real Vietnam. One of the best traveling experiences.We travelled as a group of 5. Chung was always available to answer our questions before the tour, which helped with the preparation.We did the 3 day north vietnam tour (mai chau, phu yen, back to hanoi). The scenery was just lovely with a combination of smooth cruising on-roads and challenging off-road tracks depending on our preference. Lodging and meals was well chosen as well.The guide knew his way around the country and we also had a mechanic with us. The tour was definitely more fun with Vuong and Tu with their positive attitude and local know-how.We were all left touched by Vietnam's beauty and a ton of memories from the motorbike tour.

Tour of a lifetime!. No joke, this tour was amazing. Don't hesitate just book it. Tour guides are more fun than you can imagine and know all the roads. We did the 4 day hanoi tour but the 11 day hanoi to sapa is meant to be the king of the tours.I just got my bike license right before this tour so hadn't ridden much. Our tour guide modified the routes slightly to reduce the amount of offroad riding for us.Overnight stays in local villages is so much fun and be prepared to drink a bit of rice wine ;)Can't recommend this tour more :)

4 day tour to sapa. We have just finished 4 day tour to sapa. Our guide Johnny was fantastic - funny, knowledgable, friendly and did all he could to keep us safe and happy on and off the road. Food and accommodation was great! Unfortunately we hit some bad weather before we got to sapa which meant we could not (comfortably) finish our journey... Johnny and Chung arranged for truck to take us and our bikes back to hanoi. Definitely recommend!!!

Soul Tonic motorcycle adventures. Vietnam on motorcycle is the obvious choice and probably the best way to experience rural Vietnam. Up close and personal and out of your comfort zone. This is not just an adventure but a cultural journey into the heart of Vietnam. In the hands of our experienced guide Vuong we were taken down many backroads only possible with local knowledge. Vuong was able to assess the groups riding abilities and customise the route accordingly. We never felt pushed to the to max. Our group consisted of beginners and experienced riders. Get used to riding at a slower pace. It all makes sense when you have to share the road with 20million other riders. Chung the owner is friendly in person, and made the booking process painless via the internet. We were fetched from our hotel and dropped off at the end. The bikes used are, either 125cc off-road or if you want a bit more power a 250cc off-road bike and they are all in good condition. We stayed in a combination of hotels and home stays. I preferred the homestays because they were run by local Vietnamese with which we could interact. I have had such a rich experience that I will be back for a longer trip. Just a note. If you are used to riding a large dualsport machine don't let the small bikes put you off this adventure, you will be missing out for sure. If there has been a little rain you will be grateful for the smaller bikes(lots of mud). If you can, plan for about 6-8 days. Do this trip you won't regret it! Thank you guys five⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Awesome 8 day tour. We took the 8 day tour through Northern Viet Nam with a terrific guide called Vuong. He was a ton of fun and really helped us improve our riding skills while making sure we had a terrific experience in this beautiful place. The bikes (125s and 250s) were in great shape and performed well no matter what the road conditions. We stayed at nice places throughout and the food was incredible. Our friends that we travelled with did most of the preliminary arrangements so they worked more with Chung than we did but when we did he was just as good as all the reviews say. We would work with these folks again in a heartbeat and highly recommend them to others interested in this type of adventure.

Fantastic 8 day northwest Vietnam tour.. Had a great trip! Before the trip Chung was so responsive with all of our email inquiries. During the trip, our guide Vuong was even better. He really listened to us and went out of his way to make the trip better for us. He tailored the rides to our abilities and desires as much as he could. Food and lodging was good for the most part and Vuong paid attention to what we liked and didn't like. He even helped the cooks at a lot of the places to make the food more to his/our liking! The scenery in northern Vietnam is hard to beat. Loved the whole trip. Would highly recommend a tour with these guys.

Wonderful adventure on the 8 day northern Vietnam tour.. Highly recommend. My husband and two friends just returned from the 8 day tour of northern Vietnam and we loved it. Vuong Ngo our guide was excellent and always offered us choices based on our riding ability. If you book this trip you will have opportunities to tailor the trip as you go. Vuong is a really skilled rider but his people skills are what made the trip so fun. He listened and went out of his way to make sure we had fun whether riding or hanging out in the evenings. He would go over the map in the mornings and would mention different routes and make recommendations based on our skills. Every day was great because it was just what we needed based on how energetic and competent we were feeling.One of the reasons we booked with this tour company was bc of the quick responses from Chung. All of our questions were answered quickly and thoroughly so we felt confident that we would have a well planned and safe ride. We were not disappointed.

Hanoi hills tour . My partner and I did the 3 night 4 day tour through the hills of Hanoi with wan our tour guide. I travelled on an automatic scooter, my pArtner on the 125 dirt bike. Thoroughly enjoyed ourselves, home stays were brilliant and clean and great to see how the local people live.

Day out in the countryside. We were picked up by our guide from our hotel who got us a taxi to the motorbike shop about 20 minutes away. After getting fitted with our own automatic scooters and gear, we set off through the busy city traffic towards the countryside. It was pretty scary initially as all of us were first time riders and only just learnt to ride the scooter that morning, however it was easy to pick up and even my dad who is in his late fifties had no trouble getting used to riding one.The day out in the countryside was refreshing and we rode through fields, visited a temple and small villages before stopping for lunch at an ancient village. Lunch was a spread and very delicious. On the way back, my sister unfortunately injured her leg. Our guide was prepared with a first aid kit and helped to wash the wound and bandaged it before we got back to the motorbike shop. Chung came with us to the local hospital and my sister got stitched up. We were very thankful for his company as language was a barrier and appreciate that Chung went the extra mile to assist us in getting medicine and paying at the cashier.Know that you will be in good hands when you choose to go on a tour with them! Thank you Chung and team!

7 day expert Vietnam trip from Hanoi to Hoi An. We as 3 friends have just completed a 7 day tour with Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert from Hanoi to Hoi An, 2 of us are Irish and our Italian friend, we all have years of biking/racing experience, but to celebrate our 50th birthday we decided to do something quite different, and we were not disappointed!!!I've ridden extensively all over the world but this was probably my most enjoyable riding experience yet! Johnny, our guide, was Excellent!!!!!. and couldn't do enough for us, His knowledge of the roads was incredible. He'd find the most amazing tiny roads and trails through villages & wonderful scenery and fast tarmac roads for scratching. He was extremely knowledgeable on the history, geography & culture of Vietnam - we can't thank him or praise him highly enough, he exceeded our expectations, we are planning to go back and do a 11 day tour of the more challenging NW Vietnam but only with Johnny as our guide.The bike was an almost new CRF 250 but restricted, which was a shame for hooligans such as us (no big wheelies) but had all the power at the top end where it needed it and was the perfect tool for the job.We stayed on in Hoi An for 2 days without Johnny and it felt like we lost an arm when he was gone, cheers Johnny see you soon kid.We can't speak highly enough of Johnny and would highly recommend him and the company for a trip like this and we cant wait to return to Vietnam again.RegardsJoe Carey (Ireland)

Probably the best riding I've ever experienced!. I've just completed a 10 day tour with Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert. I've ridden extensively all over the world but this was probably my most enjoyable riding experience yet! Vuong, my guide, was brilliant. His knowledge of the roads was incredible. He'd find the most amazing tiny roads and trails through villages & wonderful scenery. He was extremely knowledgeable on the history, geography & culture of Vietnam - I can't praise him highly enough.The bike was an almost new CRF 250 with just 6000 km on the clock when I picked it up. As I opted to ride back roads & trails wherever possible it was the perfect tool for the job. Add to that Chungs efficiency, knowledge, rapid responses to any query I had before the trip & it all made for a wonderful biking holiday!Can't speak too highly of these guys & am already planning to return to Vietnam - hopefully next year!

The most awesome experience. This was definitely one of the greatest experiences in the last 59 years. Three of us did an 11 day tour of North West Wietnam and down to Da Nang via the Ho Chi Min trail. We had 250cc Honda off road/on road motor bikes which were brand new when we started. For us ( being large kiwis) these were definitely much better than the usual 125cc bikes. Magnificent scenery, tracks, willages and people throughout the trip. Our guide, Quynh Nguyen Van, was the best. Incredibly cheerful, funny and always willing to accommodate our desire for as much off road adventures as we could get. If you use this company and get Quynh, he will happily look after whatever type of riding suits you from on road to as scary as you want it. We couldn't recommend this company more highly and are going back to tour North West Wietnam as soon as we can.

Great North Vietnam tour - well organised. I recently started reviewing motorcycle tours in North Vietnam for his 70th birthday. After emailing a few of the better reviewed companies I decided to go through Motorbike Tour Expert. Reason - the responsiveness of Chung was fantastic and left nothing to doubt. Did a 6 day tour with a great guide (Lee) and we have already decided to look into the future for more dates to do the North East (we did the North West including Sapa). My Dad has stated it was one of the best experiences of his life. The homestays were preferred over the hotels. The local people showed great and genuine hospitality.I can strongly recommended to anyone to use this company for their motorbike tour.Ben

Hanoi to Danang. Having done the Northern Loop last year with my good friends and having been highly impressed with the service provided by Chung and his team we decided to return this year and tour central Vietnam on an 8 day tour Hanoi to Danang. Have to say that we were not disappointed in any way, and once again the organisation was perfect in every way. Quong, our tour guide was very experienced and looked after us very well indeed. Now all that remains is to tour the South of Vietnam and we wouldn't consider organising this with anyone else. Can't recommend this company highly enough.

March 2015 - Can't wait to do it all again!. Had an amazing time earlier this year when my tour guide (Jonny) took me on an 11 day trip from Hanoi to Hue. Ate some of the best food of my life while riding around on a perfectly maintained Honda XR 125. Traffic was very manageable in Hanoi and once out in the countryside the amazing roads and scenery put a constant smile on my face! Am planning to go back and do it again but for at least 14 days as this amazing experience has me wanting to come back again! Thanks to Chung for organising everything and being amazing!- Seb

October 2015 Tour. Having been on a number of previous Vietnam motorbike tours, the service received from Chung and his team has been by far the best.From the pre tour interaction to the picking up of the bikes and the start of the tour this was a far superior service than previously experiened.The quality of the bikes was by far the best we have had and the service from arranging to pick us up at the airport to arranging an extra hotel for us to stay in on our return as well as a taxi back to the airport were all first class.With other providers they were very rushed and once the trip was over didn't want to know whereas with this company you felt as if they cared right to the end, we would thoroughly recommend this company.The guide they provided was well educated and well informed about the countries history and added greatly to the enjoyment of our experience.Thanks to all for a great trip.

Memories forever - 4 day Sapa trip. As regular riders in Australia we took our good friends for their first trip to Vietnam, it would not be complete without a motor bike tour. This company proved that they are truly experts. We arranged a 4 day tour to Sapa with an overnight train back to Hanoi. 3 of us were riders with my wife being a pillion. The bike selection consisted of 2 125cc Hondas and a 110cc scooter. The bikes were well maintained and in good condition. Everything was perfectly arranged from beautiful home stay in Mai chau, wonderful local dishes and amazing scenery, lots of photo opportunities and spontaneous moments that we will remember forever. Our guide even went to the extra effort of arranging a place for us to have a shower before boarding the over night train from Sapa back to Hanoi. Jonny our guide was just a delight, he spoke good english and took care of us every step of the way. His concerns did not stop at Sapa, he arranged a taxi to take us form the train station back to our hotel in Hanoi at 5am. We would highly recommend this company and especially Jonny to anyone wanting a memorable experience.

"We had to return for more!!!". After our 2nd adventuring bike ride with the Motorbike Tour Expert company it was time to put pen to paper and award the accolades this Company deserves.in 2014 my husband and I engaged in an 8 day trip from Hanio to the Western and Northern area of Vietnam soaking up sights that were nothing less then breathtaking- a 2 day stop in Sapa in the middle of the trip being an excellent interlude. We experienced living with local families in traditional stilt houses and saw places we would never have been able to access on our own. In September 2015 we returned to Vietnam and took the North Eastern sector for 6 days thinking we had already seen the best this country had to offer but we were wrong.This place has so much to offer and boasts scenery that makes you believe you arrived on a set from "Avatar"Chung the director of Vietnam expert Motorbike Tour Expert company has developed a very professional tour company and planned the tours so there is a good balance of hotel and home stay experiences along the route. safety is a high priority and Chung personally met us at our hotel the morning of our departure to ensure all our safety equipment was suitable. Heavy duty plastic bags were supplied to ensure our gear was not immersed in dust and dirt along the trip. Lucky cause there's plenty of it!Qhiny, our tour guide was awesome-his experience and knowledge of the areas we travelled was extensive and our "history lessons" on Vietnam over a quiet drink after a long day were more than interesting.If you love riding motor bikes and up for an adventure with some get up and go then I highly to recommend this company. Remember to pack your wet weather gear if travelling during wet season.Happy travelling!!!

Excellent and challenging!. I experienced the 8 day tour of Northwest Vietnam. There were no issues. The bikes were in great shape and our guide Vuong was excellent. Vuong not only knows fun back roads and interesting sights he is also an accomplished chef! The guide made sure the bikes ran smoothly on the road and that we were having fun. Perhaps he has done it so often but he was also very accurate in telling time for distances and arrivals. The roads were amazing and if you like a challenging backroad just ask for it. I have been riding for over 10 years and I have certainly never come across roads that were so interesting. The hotel stays were nice and clean and the homestays were also quite interesting, clean and friendly. The only bit of advice is to be honest with yourself and your level of riding skill, the traffic and roads will put it to the test. I recommend this trip for intermediate to advanced riders (other trips may be easier). It is a great experience and I highly recommend. Thanks Chung!

Day tour, best day of my holiday.. My partner and I booked a day tour well in advance and were not disappointed. We were picked up from our hotel on a taxi, taken to the shop and acquainted with our very new, clean and in great condition bikes. Our day trip around the Hanoi countryside was fun, exciting and catered for our level of experience. Sy was fabulous the whole way.The provided lunch was delicious and plentiful!I only wish I had booked a longer trip!

2 day tour from Hanoi to Mai Chau. We just finished 2 amazing days riding on 250CC off-road bikes from Hanoi to Mai Chau. This is really the best way to experience and see a place you've never been and we can highly recommend Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert. They handled everything very professionally, from proposing different tours with good description of each, flexible when it came to when we wanted to start off and if wanted to ride alone or with a group, and the guide Johnny was really very good both as a guide and travel companion. We will definitely go back and next time do at least a 5 day tour.

BEST PART OF OUR TRIP!. We did the two-day/one-night Mai Chau trip, and loved it so much we took another trip the next weekend to Thac Ba Lake! It was both my partner and my first time ever riding motorbikes, and Chung was incredibly patient as he taught us how to ride despite our rocky start on our first day! We were given lots of protective gear, which was needed. I ended up riding an automatic, and my partner rode a manual XR125--I tried the manual, but it was incredibly top heavy for my size and experience. We spent 6-8 hrs riding each day (mostly because of my slow speed), and saw the most stunning scenery. We rode through as many back roads as possible, through gorgeous, FRIENDLY villages, where our guides arranged for generally excellent food for us. Both trips we stayed in home stays (houses on stilts). The second trip felt particularly special, as we stayed with our guide Hoan (who we loved!), with his 6-month old daughter, his wife, his mother, and his grandmother in their traditional Dao stilt home. We ate an absolutely incredible meal with a his entire family and a few other guests that night (though the local drinking tradition is intense!) for one of the highlights of our entire trip in Vietnam. The next morning, Hoan took my partner and I out on his family's boat into Thac Ba Lake, which was gorgeous and peaceful. The scenery to Mai Chau was more consistently impressive, but the terrain to Thac Ba was a little more challenging (with some off roading!), so was more fun for our second ride. Both trips included phenomenal coverage of small countryside villages and roads. We could not recommend Chung, his company, his staff or the bike trips more highly! If and when we are back in Vietnam, we will carve out time for a longer trip.

Fantastic! The ONLY way to visit Vietnam!. I did the 11-day Best Vietnam Motorbike Tour and the experience was incredible. This is really the best possible way to experience Vietnam, as it gives you control to interact and live in the environment (rather than by car/bus). The guide (Thon) was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. Be warn, for safety, that you should have plenty experience on motorbikes and feel comfortable. Also, very much liked the CRF-250cc upgrade, was definitely worth the extra price. Will be doing a followup tour soon! Thanks Chung/Thon!!!

Incredible 8 day Northern Vietnam Tour!. My husband and I did an 8 day tour and could not have been happier that we picked this company! Chung was incredible helping us choose the right tour for us and responded to emails almost immediately. My husband is an experienced rider but I was not, and the team helped train me how to ride until I was comfortable before we set off. The bikes were brand new, all safety equipment provided and all meals and accommodation were included in the package. The route we took was amazing and we got to see and experience so many fantastic places! Our guide, Johnny, was extremely knowledgeable, easygoing and taught us so much along the way. He was an absolute legend! He enabled us to interact with the locals by translating and we felt like we got to experience the real Vietnam culture. We highly recommend this company and definitely suggest doing 8 days or longer to really get the full experience. We would love to come back and do another tour with them in the future. Thanks Chung and Johnny for a life changing adventure!!!

Country Day Ride around Hanoi. We had the most amazing day ride ! Chung & his team were fantastic ! So informative about Vietnam's history. They took us to places you would never see otherwise. An experience we will never forget ! Lots of laughs & fun riding, delicious traditional lunch & met local people. A must do activity if you enjoy bike riding, it's the best way to see the country !John & Gail

Day Trip to the countryside!. I recently did a day trip with Chung to the Hanoi countryside - it was a brilliant experience with a great professional guide. In addition to experiencing Hanoi's famous traffic (which was exciting)I learnt a lot from Chung about Vietnam and the Vietnamese way of life. A particular hi light was meeting and having a traditional tea with 3 generations of his family. We stopped along the way as I wanted to make photographs. At each stop I met and chatted to genuinely friendly people - This was an experience that will remain with me for a long time and I now look forward to doing a bigger bike trip in future. Chung and his colleagues were friendly, professional and good fun. Anybody wanting to see Vietnam countryside and its people should book with Chung.

There's no better way to experience Vietnam . My cousin and I went on a day tour with Chung and Hoan. They went above and beyond to give us an experience that we'd both never forget. We only had time for a day tour and even with that they completely exceeded our expectations. Their tours are very thoughtful and organized.From making sure that we were comfortable, safe while still having fun was always a priority to them. They were both very knowledgeable and helpful to learning our country's history (we're both Vietnamese and this was our first time being back in Vietnam as adults), we learned quite a bit in one day. Touring with Chung and Hoan was one of the best memories we've had in Vietnam.It was such a wonderful experience, that we're already thinking about the next time that we can come back!!

Excellent 12 day tour of the North. My wife and I have had an amazing experience on our 12 day motorcycle tour throughout North Vietnam. Chung has been extremely helpful throughout the whole experience. Our guide "Tan" was amazing. He has great English and is very knowledgeable. Nothing was ever a problem. I would recommend Chung as a tour operator to anyone and I highly recommend Tan as the perfect guide on your trip :)We had expected to have a lot of rain on our tour, but we only had a couple of days with an hour or two. The tour took us through some of the most amazing scenery I have ever seen and we got to experience the local culture and food first hand. Thanks Chung and Tan for such a fantastic holiday :)We hope to book with you again!

Only way to see Vietnam!. Probable one of the best experiences in my life, amazing views, brand new bikes and awsome tour guide, worth every cent and more. Was a private tour with just me and my wife so was so much better than having to wait for other people. Did the 2 day trip and all food and drinks included, saw unbeleivale things, awsome tracks, and the tour guide made it very safe. Stayed and a homestay at Mau chau and was awsome to see the real Vietnam and people working on real rice fields, dinner and breakfast also included. I will recommends to all my friends and to anyone, Chung was very professional and the tour guide to the time to tell us about everything. I will definately be back to do the longer trip with all my friends. If you dont anything in vietnam, do this and you will be satisified. When I go back to Vietnam, I'll be going back for this ride. 100 percent do it.

motorcycle trip through northern vietnam. we did a last minute 3 day trip through northern vietnam. everything was well planned and perfect. Hoan was our guide and he was great. even took us on a boat tour of the lake by his house.

AMAZING 1 DAY TOUR!. We had one day left in Hanoi and were desperate to do a Motorcycle Tour (neither of us had motorcyle experience), looked at some reviews and are so glad we followed these recommendations! Ideally we were looking for something outside of the normal tourist routes and this was PERFECT! Contacted Chung via email and he responded almost immediately!Chung arranged the tour: taxi to shop, breakfast, coffee, practice time, motorcyles, helmets, gloves lunch, drinks, local "snacks" and an in depth knowledge of the history of each Pagoda/ Temple/ Town we visited along the way. Amazing experience to drive through rice fields and smaller towns and will definitely be recommending this trip to our friends. Chung ensured we were confident with our driving ability before taking us on to any major roads, reminding us that should we need to we could pull over at any time and he would wait until we were ready to carry on.Great knowledge of the history of the areas we were visiting and made the trip really unique. Local lunch and drinks gave us an even better experience of local life and culture. We'll definitely be heading back for a longer trip next time!THANKS CHUNG!

Responsive via email, willing to customize, with top-notch bikes. These guys are legit. They're located near Hanoi University, they speak and write excellent English, they have top-notch bikes imported from Thailand, they are VERY good with email queries, and they're willing to customize everything. Excellent people.I live in San Jose, USA, and initiated contact with 5 or so motorbike providers in the Hanoi area about a month and a half in advance of my trip. In general, 90% of what you are going to run into are resellers, 90% of whom are mostly illiterate in English. None of them can tell you much about your trip or your equipment except for vague platitudes.The "Tour Experts", though, are 100% responsive to email, usually within 12 hours. They know what they're talking about, and can tell you exact details about anything. Just email them; they are really good at responding promptly.When I was riding between rice paddies on an elevated dirt path 30 km outside Hanoi on a beautiful 250 Yamaha dirt bike, I was giggling like a little kid again. When we zipped past a herd of water buffalo outside a smoky brick factory I laughed out loud to myself.I traveled about 500km total with these guys and I trust them with my life. I have been to Vietnam multiple times and my time with them on my most recent trip was by far the most hilarious and fun. Good people, good equipment, and good service. 100% recommend.

Best way to see Vietnam, by far. My wife and I just finished a 5 day tour of northwest Vietnam, booked through Vietnam Motorbike Tour Expert. From the start, Chung was extremely responsive and answered every question I had about the your. My wife and I were true beginners to motorbiking but Chung supplied us with an automatic bike and was patient with us. Our guide, Voung, was awesome. He was funny and light hearted and really knew the roads well. The trip was one of the best things I have done I'm years of traveling. The food was incredible. I am convinced that this is the best was to see this beautiful country. I admit that I was wary at first, safety wise. But Voung was patient with both of us and we kept the rides very safe. I would recommend this tour 10 times out of 10.

best decision of my life!!. i don't know where to start, everything was amazing! cannot recommend this company enough.everything was well planned out, the tour guides are great people, every bit of the journey was an amazing view and great locals. only managed to fit a 10 day trip of north Vietnam into our holiday schedule, would have done longer if possible. all i can say is thanks a ton to our brilliant tour guide culng, and chung for helping me organize the trip prior to our holiday.

8 perfect days in North Vietnam. So, I chose Mr. Chung's motorcycle tours due to the great endorsements on Tripadvisor, and am glad that I did. Chung was so friendly and accommodating from start to finish. His prices are fair and reasonable for all this included in the price. All I had to pay extra for was drinks, which in Vietnam are cheap. The guide that Chung matched me with ( Hoan) was also exceptional. Hoan was patient, funny, flexible, and took care of the details. All I had to do was relax and enjoy the rides each day.
